movies.title: spider-man no way home
movies.description: Spider-Man: No Way Home is a 2021 American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man, co-produced by Columbia Pictures and Marvel Studios and distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing.

movies.title: Doctor Strange In The Multiverse Of Madness
movies.description: Dr Stephen Strange casts a forbidden spell that opens a portal to the multiverse. However, a threat emerges that may be too big for his team to handle.

movies.title: Fast and Furious 9
movies.description: F9 is a 2021 American action film directed by Justin Lin from a screenplay by Daniel Casey and Lin. It is the sequel to The Fate of the Furious, serving as the ninth main installment, and the tenth full-length film in the Fast & Furious franchise

movies.title: Mortal Kombat
movies.description: Cole Young, a washed-up MMA fighter, is chosen to join a team of champions in a high-stakes battle to prevent the Earth from being taken over by Outworld.
